item.description:
I realize in the past we have attended the BK Toy Run, but I thought this would be a very nice change. 

 Chris Wetherbee Toy Run.  We will be leaving Cumby’s at 9:15 SHARP.  $10 per person, or the donation of a new toy.  Coffee and breakfast items available at the Buzzards Bay Eagles Hall, where we will meet up with CCHOG Chapter, and other area groups.  Riding to Falmouth to the Carriage House, where we meet the families that benefit from our donations.  They typically thank us with free chili, clam chowder, hot dogs, drinks, and desserts, which are donated from local businesses.  

The ride itself is well organized and safely done.
item.how_to_find_us: Actually meeting at Cumberland Farms ACROSS from Harmony II and Wal*Mart at Rts 58 & 106
item.name: Chris Wetherbee Toy Run
